short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create custom checklists for repetitive tasks on any website!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create a checklist to keep track of repetitive tasks on any website. Just choose the website url, add the steps, and click on the extension to see your checklist. 

For example, create checklists while entering data into Google Sheets, creating meetings in Google Calendar, or sending emails in gmail.

Features:
- 100% Free
- Any URL
- Unlimited checklists
- Unlimited steps per checklist

This extension was inspired by Atul Gawande's book, The Checklist Manifesto, where he describes how even neurosurgeons benefit from simple checklists!
